mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number, is_served) SELECT #{memberName}, #{upperDivisionCode}, #{lowerDivisionCode}, #{adAccount}, #{officePhoneNumber}, 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT M.ad_account FROM member M WHERE M.ad_account = #{adAccount})
mapper.select: SELECT upper_division FROM member GROUP BY upper_division
SELECT lower_division FROM member WHERE upper_division = #{upperDivision} GROUP BY lower_division

SELECT M.member_name, C1.category_name AS upper_division, C2.category_name AS lower_division, M.ad_account, M.office_phone_number FROM member M JOIN category C1 ON (C1.category_code = M.upper_division) JOIN category C2 ON (C2.category_code = M.lower_division) WHERE M.ad_account = #{adAccount}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET is_served = 'N', retire_date=NOW() WHERE ad_account = #{adAccount}
UPDATE member SET is_served = 'Y', retire_date = null WHERE ad_account = #{adAccount}
mapper.select: SELECT M.member_name, C1.category_name AS upper_division, C2.category_name AS lower_division, M.ad_account, M.office_phone_number FROM member M JOIN authorities A ON (A.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN' AND M.ad_account = A.username) JOIN category C1 ON (C1.category_code = M.upper_division) JOIN category C2 ON (C2.category_code = M.lower_division)
